name: Don't Drop
description:
Don't Drop is a simple and casual game, having four different and colored environments with eight unlockable characters. 

It is based on an endless jumper environment, making it an relaxing and peaceful experience trying to beat your own highscores and earning more coins.

You can download Don't Drop on Google Play for FREE!

We hope you like it!

CREATED BY

Big Three Games (@bigthreegames)

SONG

by Vinicius D'Avila
